name: ExposureManager
overview:
ExposureManager’s mission is to provide professional-grade e-commerce services to professional photographers.

We provide feature-rich customizable galleries backed up by superior, pro-lab fulfillment and customer service. We serve thousands working professional photographers, and handle the online sales for small working professionals as well a number of major media clients youâ€™d immediately recognize - if only we could talk about them.

ExposureManagerâ€™s in-house lab also differentiates it from most of the competition, because it makes us a true partner â€“ not just a middleman to a 3rd party lab â€“ to our community of pro photographers.

Our photographers shoot more, worry less, and earn more, because we provide workflows designed around the needs of the pro photographer. Our photographersâ€™ images are displayed on galleries that can be customized to show only their brand, then shipped in envelopes displaying only their brand - because at ExposureManager it’s about the photographers we serve.

EM was bootstrap funded, is profitable, has grown over 50% in the last year, and is always releasing new functions and products based on feedback from our community.
